= Image Workflow =

Getting Started

Register as a new user on CCDB portal at: http://ccdb-portal.crbs.ucsd.edu/web/guest/home?p_p_id=58&p_p_lifecycle=1&p_p_state=maximized&p_p_mode=view&saveLastPath=0&_58_struts_action=%2Flogin%2Fcreate_account

After you login as a ccdb user, 
The CCDB image workflow page has an upload tool called Jibber that will help you spatially register and warp your mouse brain microscopy products to the Allen Reference Atlas and/or WHS.
